00031 const char *logLevelNames( LogLevel level )
00032 {
00033     switch( level ) {
00034     case error:
00035         return "error";
00036     case warning:
00037         return "warning";
00038     case notice:
00039         return "notice";
00040     case info:
00041         return "info";
00042     case verbose_info:
00043         return "verbose";
00044     }
00045 
00046     return "//no_log//";
00047 }
00048 
00049 void MessageHandlerBase::stopBelow( LogLevel stop )
00050 {
00051     m_stop_below = stop;
00052 }
00053 
00054 bool MessageHandlerBase::requestStop( LogLevel _level )
00055 {
00056     if ( m_stop_below > _level ) {
00057 #ifdef WIN32
00058         LOG( Debug, error ) << "Sorry stopping is not supported on Win32";
00059         return false;
00060 #else
00061         return kill( getpid(), SIGTSTP ) == 0;
00062 #endif
00063     } else
00064         return false;
00065 }
00066 
00067 std::string Message::strTime()const
00068 {
00069     return boost::posix_time::to_simple_string( m_timeStamp );
00070 }
00071 
00072 Message::Message( std::string object, std::string module, std::string file, int line, LogLevel level, boost::weak_ptr<MessageHandlerBase> _commitTo )
00073     : commitTo( _commitTo ),
00074       m_object( object ),
00075       m_module( module ),
00076       m_file( file ),
00077       m_timeStamp( boost::posix_time::second_clock::universal_time() ),
00078       m_line( line ),
00079       m_level( level )
00080 {}
00081 
00082 Message::Message( const Message &src ) //we need a custom copy-constructor, because the copy-contructor of ostringstream is private
00083     : std::ostringstream( src.str() ),
00084       commitTo( src.commitTo ),
00085       m_object( src.m_object ),
00086       m_module( src.m_module ),
00087       m_file( src.m_file ),
00088       m_subjects( src.m_subjects ),
00089       m_timeStamp( src.m_timeStamp ),
00090       m_line( src.m_line ),
00091       m_level( src.m_level )
00092 {}
00093 
00094 Message::~Message()
00095 {
00096     if ( shouldCommit() ) {
00097         commitTo.lock()->commit( *this );
00098         str( "" );
00099         clear();
00100         commitTo.lock()->requestStop( m_level );
00101     }
00102 }
00103 
00104 
00105 std::string Message::merge()const
00106 {
00107     std::string ret( str() );
00108     size_t found = std::string::npos;
00109     std::list<std::string>::const_iterator subj = m_subjects.begin();
00110 
00111     if ( ( found = ret.find( "{o}" ) ) != std::string::npos )
00112         ret.replace( found, 3, m_object );
00113 
00114     found = 0;
00115 
00116     while ( ( found = ret.find( "{s}", found ) ) != std::string::npos )
00117         ret.replace( found, 3, std::string( "\"" ) + * ( subj++ ) + "\"" );
00118 
00119     return ret;
00120 }
00121 
00122 bool Message::shouldCommit()const
00123 {
00124     if( str().empty() )
00125         return false;
00126 
00127     const boost::shared_ptr<MessageHandlerBase> buff( commitTo.lock() );
00128 
00129     if ( buff )
00130         return ( buff->m_level >= m_level );
00131     else return false;
00132 }
00133 
00134 LogLevel MessageHandlerBase::m_stop_below = error;
00135 
00136 
00137 } //namespace _internal
00138 
00139 std::ostream *DefaultMsgPrint::o = &::std::cerr;
00140 void DefaultMsgPrint::commit( const _internal::Message &mesg )
00141 {
00142     if( last.empty() || last != mesg.str() ) {
00143         *o << mesg.m_module << ":" << _internal::logLevelNames( mesg.m_level );
00144 #ifndef NDEBUG //if with debug-info
00145         *o << "[" << mesg.m_file.leaf() << ":" << mesg.m_line << "] "; //print the file and the line
00146 #else
00147         *o << "[" << mesg.m_object << "] "; //print the object/method
00148 #endif //NDEBUG
00149         *o << mesg.merge(); //print the message itself
00150         *o << std::endl;
00151         last = mesg.str();
00152     }
00153 }
00154 
00155 void DefaultMsgPrint::setStream( ::std::ostream &_o )
00156 {
00157     o->flush();
00158     o = &_o;
00159 }

00161 }
